bioconda.name: macsylib
bioconda.summary: MacSyLib: Python library that help to detect of macromolecular, systems genetic pathways… in prokaryotes protein datasets using systems modelling and similarity search.

biotools.summary: a Python package library that allow to model and detect macromolecular systems, genetic pathways… by similarity search in prokaryotes datasets.

bioschemas.name: MacSyLib
bioschemas.summary: a Python package library that allow to model and detect macromolecular systems, genetic pathways… by similarity search in prokaryotes datasets.
